text: Argeş is a river in the southern part of Romania. It is a tributary of the Danube River. == Tributaries == The following are the tributaries of the Argeș River: Left: Buda, Valea cu Peşti, Valea Lupului, Limpedea, Chiciura, Valea Iaşului, Vâlsan, Valea Satului, Râul Doamnei, Râncaciov, Cârcinov, Budişteanca, Sabar, Câlnău, Dâmboviţa, Rasa, and Luica. Right: Capra, Cumpăna, Valea lui Stan, Arefu, Băneşti, Valea Danului, Tutana, Schiau, Bascov, Neajlov and Zboiul. Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Tributaries of the Danube Category:Argeș County Category:Dâmbovița County Category:Ilfov County Category:Giurgiu County Category:Călărași County
title: Argeș (river)
